SCREENING_SECTION.TITLE: Screening
SCREENING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Choose your technical role and answer questions, solve problems in real time depending on the level of complexity. Get an automatic assessment of your knowledge to further hone your skills. Our complete library of questions is suitable for both beginners and professionals.

INTERVIEWS_SECTION.TITLE: Interviews
INTERVIEWS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Conduct interviews online, check yourself and your interlocutor. Use our libraries and templates to streamline your work to improve your programming skills. Move to the next level after reaching your goals.

PRACTICE_ANSWERING_INTERVIEW_QUESTIONS_S.TITLE: Practice answering interview questions
PRACTICE_ANSWERING_INTERVIEW_QUESTIONS_S.DESCRIPTION: Answer interview questions to test your knowledge and improve your skills. Exchange experience with your rival and help each other in one common goal. Advance to the next level of difficulty when you're ready.

COMMON.YOU_WILL_GET_SUBTITLE:
You will get the opportunity to improve your skills,
get a real-time assessment and get an interview with a strong opponent!
